title: Vacation of Holly Hills at Grand

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO. 245	    INTRODUCED BY:    ALDERMAN THOMAS A. VILLA An ordinance recommended by the Board of Public Service to conditionally vacate above surface, surface and sub-surface rights for vehicle, equestrian and pedestrian travel in excess portion of Holly Hills of an irregular shape at the western line of Grand Ave. adjacent to City Block 5869 in the City of St. Louis, Missouri, as hereinafter described, in accordance with Charter authority, and in conformity with Section l4 of Article XXI of the Charter and imposing certain conditions on such vacation.
